mapper.select:
SELECT A.USER_SEQ, A.EMAIL, A.PASSWORD FROM TB_USER A WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND UPPER(A.EMAIL) = UPPER(#{email})

SELECT A.USER_NO AS EMPL_NO, A.EMAIL, A.USER_NM AS NAME, A.USER_TEL AS TEL, A.USER_HP AS MOBILE, A.USER_FAX AS FAX, A.USER_BIRTH AS BIRTH, CASE WHEN A.USER_SEX = 'M' THEN '남자' WHEN A.USER_SEX = 'F' THEN '여자' ELSE '기타' END AS SEX, A.ENTRY_YMD AS ENTRY_DT, A.QUIT_YMD AS QUIT_DT, FN_GET_POSI_NM(A.POSI_CD) AS POSI, FN_GET_DUTY_NM(A.DUTY_CD) AS DUTY, FN_GET_DEPT_NM(A.DEPT_CD) AS DEPT FROM TB_USER A WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND UPPER(A.EMAIL) = UPPER(#{email})
AND UPPER(A.USER_NM) = UPPER(#{name})
ORDER BY A.USER_SEQ DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_USER SET REF_TOKEN = #{refToken}, REF_ISSUE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE UPPER(EMAIL) = UPPER(#{email})
mapper.select: SELECT A.EMAIL FROM TB_USER A WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.REF_TOKEN = #{refToken}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_USER SET LAST_LOGIN_DT = SYSDATE, LAST_LOGIN_IP = #{remoteAddr} WHERE UPPER(EMAIL) = UPPER(#{email})
